"A.P.241/？/？/？": "It's okay, everyone is a beginner at the start! But when tomorrow comes, you'll be an experienced veteran! It'll all work out in the end!"
"So just this once... You can pretend you got tricked and try out Bouncer!"
"Uhm, even if you say that, I'm not really..."
"Come on! You know you want to! If you apply now, I'll include my easy-to-use Dual Blades! It's a wonderful deal!"
"Isn't this a weird way of recruiting people!? And besides, I'm not ARKS, so I probably wouldn't handle a class like that very well..."
"Ah! <%me>! A little help, please!"
"Oh, <%me>. This young lady is your friend, right?"
"That's even more of a reason to try being a Bouncer!"
"After all, this was a class created by <%me>!"
"Wait, really?! It is?!"
"No."
"Saga! You're supposed to back me up!"
"I'm not backing up a lie."
"Well... I may have been exaggerating when I say they \"created\" it, but they were a big part of spreading it!"
"...Really?"
"Yes, yes, that's right!"
"1. It was Katori who spread Bouncer"
"2. It was Saga who spread Bouncer"
"3. You both spread Bouncer together"
"Wha... For you to say such a powerful thing to me... I'm so happy to be alive!"
"<%me>... Please don't tease Katori too much. She hasn't really grown up at all."
"Hey! It's rude to nod and agree with him!"

"Well surely-
...no, I'm useless, maybe because I'm short-
...maybe because I wasn't a good-..."
"...Honestly. Although I can't deny that fact, that statement is more of an exaggeration."
"Well, uh, definitely, but even so!"
"Saga's actually blushing from hearing you say that so boldly!"
"Ah. I feel the same as <%me>."
"Saga!?"
"The Bouncer class has been recognized by many in ARKS."

"Its spread has never been just the power of one person, but of many cooperating. Thanks to
<%me>, and thanks to Katori's personality as well."
"Saga..."
"...Wait. My personality? Then I haven't really helped that much?"
"Big sis... What does that mean?"
"I think it means this lady lies about a lot."
"How mean!"
"Those two aren't ARKS, are they? As usual, you seem to be in the middle of troublesome matters."
"I won't try to stop you. Helping people is just who you are, like how Katori advertises bouncer however she can. No one would stop just cause I say so, right?"
